body:
Add support for a bunch of LAMMPS packages:

mliap
user-adios
user-awpmd
user-bocs
user-cgsdk
user-colvars
user-diffraction
user-dpd
user-drude
user-eff
user-fep
user-manifold
user-mesodpd
user-mesont
user-mgpt
user-mofff
user-phonon
user-plumed
user-ptm
user-qtb
user-reaction
user-sdpd
user-smd
user-smtbq
user-sph
user-tally
user-uef
user-yaff
title: lammps: Add support for a number of new LAMMPS add-on packages
